title: Ophelia's Revenge
description: Medieval Magic and Mysticism> a castle seething with the ghosts of those murdered within its walls> one of the ghosts is intent on vengeance (not Hamlet' father!)Medieval Outsiders> a girl taken from the only life she has known (that of a peasant) and expected to live as a great lady in the castle of the king> a prince who cannot play the macho role expected of him> a herbalist with a rather too comprehensive collection of poisons
author: Rebecca Reisert
